title: Can AI Legally Turn $100,000 Into $1 Million? Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman Says That's The Real Test Of Intelligence
description: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman says the modern test of artificial intelligence is not whether it can sound human but whether an AI agent can legally turn $100,000 into $1 million, as Big Tech intensifies its race toward AGI amid a fierce talent war.
content:
On Monday, Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT) AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman says the next milestone toward artificial general intelligence won't be about sounding human, but about whether an AI agent can independently and legally create real economic value.

title: FSS becomes the first payments company in India, ME, APAC & SA to achieve ISO IEC 42001 Certification
description: Mumbai (Maharashtra) [India], January 6: India: Financial Software and Systems (FSS) a global leader in payments technology and transaction processing, has become the first payments company in India, the Middle East, APAC and South Africa to be certified as an ISO IEC 42001 Certification Lead, reinforcing its leadership in responsible and ethical use of artificial intelligence (AI) in payments and banking technology. By achieving ISO IEC 42001 Certification, FSS signals a shift from ad-hoc AI usage to a structured, enterprise-wide AI governance model, positioning AI governance alongside information security and quality management as a core business priority.

content:

title: Budget 2026 puts India’s data centre backbone at the centre of its AI ambitions
description: Union Budget 2026: India's ambition of becoming a leading global player in artificial intelligence needs a strong policy push in data centre development. The upcoming Union Budget 2026 serves as a crucial turning point for catalysing growth. Industry players note the importance of improved energy access, expedited regulatory approvals, and well-defined policies for the long haul.
